div.p: "KILLING JESUS." THANK YOU ALL VERY MUCH.
THIS SUMMER, WE’LL BE UPDATING OUR WEBSITE, BILLO’REILLY.COM,
SO WE WOULD LIKE YOUR INPUT. THERE IS A SURVEY THAT WILL HELP
US BETTER UNDERSTAND HOW TO SERVE YOU ONLINE.
SO I HOPE YOU’LL TAKE A MOMENT, GIVE US SOME FEEDBACK.
THIS IS FOR EVERYONE, NOT JUST PREMIUM MEMBERS, AND TO REWARD
YOU, WE HAVE A BRAND-NEW NEWS QUIZ AND A BRAND-NEW HISTORY
QUIZ ON BILLO’REILLY.COM. THEY’RE A LOT OF FUN.
SO HERE’S A TIP. PLEASE HELP US OUT.
AND THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT.
FOX NEWS WEBSITE, WHICH IS DIFFERENT FROM BILLOREILLY.COM
